lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: To make room for the crowd, what did Jesus do?
answers: Teach from a boat in the water
Move the crowd to another town

questions.text: What did Jesus tell Simon to do? What happened?
answers: Throw his nets over; they caught two boatfuls of fish
Sail to the other side of the lake

questions.text: When Jesus said, 'Follow me,' what did Simon and his friends do?
answers: Went home to tell their families
Returned to fishing the next day

questions.text: Who was Levi? What other name did he go by?
When Jesus told Levi, 'Follow me,' what did Levi do?
answers: Asked Jesus to pay him money

questions.text: After Jesus told Philip to follow him, what did Philip do?
answers: Told his friend Nathanael that he'd found the Christ

questions.text: What did Nathanael say about Jesus?
answers: Nazareth? Can anything good come from there?
I've never heard of this Jesus guy
By showing that he heard and saw Nathanael from far away
By raising a man from the dead

questions.text: How many men did Jesus choose to be his disciples?
How can a person become a disciple of Jesus?
answers: Believe the good news and follow Jesus
